param.name: subject
param.label: Subject
param.description: Optionally input invite email subject; if left blank a subject will be applied.

param.name: body
param.label: Body
param.description: Optionally input private message to include with invite email.

param.name: user_id
param.label: Owner
param.description: Input owner of invite as single integer user_id. This is the user who sent the invite.

param.name: user
param.label: User
param.description: Optionally input user of invite as single integer user_id. This is the user who accepted the invite.
